description:
Replace conservatory in back garden with new single storey extension.
Addition of new 1st floor sash window and other windows within the side elevation at the rear.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Tree Protection</span></p><p>Tree protection for all trees at the site and on adjacent land shall be undertaken in accordance with the recommendations as set out in the Arboricultural report (Prepared by Frank Parsons Arboriculturalist, dated 8 May 2021).&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In order to protect the health of the trees.&nbsp;</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Prior to the commencement of works other than demolition,&nbsp; details of all facing materials to be used on the hereby approved extension shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, and shall be maintained as such thereafter.<br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cd921e1d-7fff-4230-d561-0027dee8b44a"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the subject building and the surrounding&nbsp;</span>Victoria Park Conservation Area.</p>

<p>The first floor window in the rear/side elevation shall be fixed shut and obscure glazed below 1.7m (above floor level).&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2eeef188-7fff-c43f-75ef-c9140f7bf62e"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Reason: To safeguard the residential amenity of occupiers of the neighbouring property. </span></span><br></p>
